page.title: 03Farming 2
page.content: The tenant farmers take a keen interest in horses and have bred many {champion mares}.They have been popular judges at gymkhana events and the wife is skilled as a dog trainer. She also drives a pony and cart for pleasure. They have devoted all their working lives to farming and owe their success to adapting with the times and making the most of their various skills. { Kings Farm}is over {300 years old}and has about{60 acres}of land. The farmhouse is elegant and has a swimming pool on the front terrace. The owner tends all the animals herself with the occasional help of an old man. She has dogs, cats and sheep including a hand reared lamb. They specialise in{beef cattle}having 16 Dexters and 34 Herefords. She bred {donkeys}from 1964 to 1978 having a maximum of 42 at one time.
